name: Combustile Gold!
description:
MINE THE ROCKS!

GET THE GOLD!

FEED THE TRASHCAN THE GOLD BEFORE IT EXPLODES!

ALso everything is 2-frame animation! :D

CONTROLS

Move with WASD!

Interact with Left Mouse Button (Hold down it to mine!)

Rotate Camera with Mouse Scroll!!! (Forgot to write this in-game hehe)

IMPORTANT!!!

This game is not even close to being finished!!!

HAVE FUN! :D
